{"id":928952454,"question_id":259,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1680771651,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"25 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/928952454/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum Smaller","memory":"42.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int threeSumSmaller(int[] nums, int target) {\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        \n        int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        int res =0;\n        for(int i=0; i<len-2; i++){\n\n            int j=i+1, k=len-1;\n            \n            while(j<k){\n                \n                int sum = nums[i]+nums[j]+nums[k];\n                \n                if(sum < target){\n                    res+= k-j;\n                    j++;\n                }else{\n                    k--;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n}\n        \n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum-smaller","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
